ComicInfo.Title: War Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Changing the face of the galaxy as you know it!
It's all out war as the Sith Empire unleashes its forces and its secret weapons on the rest of the galaxy. As Emperor-in-Exile Roan Fel loses ground against the Sith, he plots to use the enemy's own devices against them—regardless of the cost in innocent lives.
Meanwhile, Cade Skywalker has a plan to draw out Darth Krayt for a showdown, a Sith spy within Fel's ranks is revealed, and Fel's own spy meets her fate!
The final chapter of Legacy continues!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-14 21:12:40. [CVDB259319]
ComicInfo.Writer: John Ostrander [41827], Jan Duursema-Mandrake, John Ostrander
ComicInfo.Characters: Admiral Gar Stazi, Andurgo, Anj Dahl, Antares Draco, Cade Skywalker, Darth Havok, Darth Krayt, Darth Maladi, Darth Talon, Deliah Blue, Gunn Yage, High Moff Morlish Veed, Hogrum Chalk, Jariah Syn, Marasiah Fel, Moff Yage, Nyna Calixte, R2-D2, Rand Ko, Roan Fel, Wolf Sazen
ComicInfo.Teams: Astromech Droids, Devaronians, Dugs, Durosians, Galactic Empire, Galactic Federation of Free Alliances, Hutts, Iktotchi, Imperial Knights, Klatooinians, New Jedi Order, One Sith, Rogue Squadron, Stormtroopers, The Sith, Twi'leks, Zabraks, Zeltrons
